name: Cactid
description: The Cactid is a large, plant-like creature with tendril-like appendages that can grapple and drain the life force from its prey.
memorable: It can drain the hit point maximum of grappled foes, potentially leading to their death.
goals: To defend itself while draining life from opponents, or to deter attackers.
relations: Might coexist with other plant creatures in arid environments.
environment: Typically found in dry, desert-like areas.
strengths: Exceptional Constitution allows it to effectively absorb damage; resistant to bludgeoning and piercing damage.
attacks: Uses two Tendril attacks to grapple and drain life from opponents, imposing disadvantage in combat.
most_powerful_ability: Hail of Needles can target multiple enemies when the Cactid is severely weakened.
senses: Possesses blindsight up to 60 feet, allowing it to detect creatures nearby.
skills: Notably low Dexterity leads to poor maneuverability but grants resilience through its Constitution.
additional_information: Can grapple Medium or smaller creatures for life-draining effects.
Drains hit point maximum from grappled foes, which resets after hydration.
Reel ability allows it to reposition grappled opponents.
Effective ambusher and resilient defender in combat.
Dual Tendril attacks make it a formidable close-range opponent.
test_queries: large plant creature that drains life
desert plant creature that uses needles
vulnerable plant monster weak to fire
